Practice Platform

A comprehensive platform to help you run your practice efficiently. Built with an easy-to-use scheduling, billing and patient portal.

Get started

EMR independence

Download Free E-Book

You have a favorite EMR or maybe you hate all EMRs. Choose an EMR of your choice for your clinical work; Choose Trillium practice platform for everything else.

Read our eBook on why it makes sense to separate your EMR from the practice platform.

Faster appointments.
More patients.

Built for self service

All schedulers are built for your internal staff. We built our scheduler from the ground up for integration with your website and SMS self scheduling.

Maximize collection

Frontdesk afraid to ask for payment? Most commercial plans have high deductibles and this is the weakest area for most clinics. Stop chasing patients and use our estimators and prepayment tools to maximize patient collection.

Drive reputation

We automatically send patients review requests after their appointments. We typically build hundreds of Google reviews in a matter of months driving up your online reputation and allowing more patients.

Click here to see our fees

Seamless engagement

Patients expect multiple engagement options just like they would with any retail business. Engage with your patients through a seamless chat/sms experience from a central console.

As a physician, there are a lot of things that stress me out, but with Primrose, managing my billing needs isn’t one of them. I know my billings will be done on time and all reports will be filed accurately

Dr. Makinde
Director | Covenant Women's Health, Texas

Payment portal

Gone are the days when patients would call to make a payment. If you do not have an option to pay online on your statement, you are losing money. Send an SMS to request payment.

Web widgets

Integrate our web widgets for your website for FREE with just 4 lines of code. Our widgets can display your Google Reviews, allow patients to message online or make an appointment.

Zero staff registration

Allow patients to complete all registration paperwork from the comfort of their home. Capture their drivers license & insurance card images; Get all consent forms signed;  collect medical history and prepare for their visit.

Remote check-inn

Imagine what it would mean if patients could check-in online and pay their copay and enter their HPI before they even show up. Would that reduce the work for your staff and elevate the experience for your patients? We believe so!

Primrose is here to help you all the way

Our mission is simple: to enable the success of your practice. From day one, we make it easy to get up and running with Primrose. Once onboarded, our support team is ready to make sure that your success continues. Free for Primrose customers.

  • Dedicated team member for personalized services
  • Risk free moving all the data to our system
  • Contact us via phone or email
